entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: Periods of heavy rain, and amounts may approach warning criteria. Thunderstorms possible this afternoon. Note, rain easing from the south late afternoon. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: The chance of upgrade for this Watch has been decreased to Low.

entry.title: Severe Thunderstorm Warning
entry.summary:
At 03:00 pm, MetService weather radar detected severe thunderstorms near TUTIRA, TE POHUE and WAIKOAU.
These severe thunderstorms are moving towards the eastnortheast, and are expected to lie near TUTIRA, WAIKOAU and TANGOIO at 03:30 pm and near TUTIRA and TANGOIO at 04:00 pm.
These thunderstorms are expected to be accompanied by torrential rain and frequent lightning.
Impact:
Torrential rain can cause surface and/or flash flooding about streams, gullies and urban areas, and make driving conditions extremely hazardous.
Frequent lightning is dangerous to people and livestock, especially those exposed outdoors or on the water, and can cause power surges and damage to electrical equipment.
